properties.areaDesc: Waters from Point Reyes to Pigeon Point 10-60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 16 at 9:02AM PST until January 16 at 9:00PM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt and seas
10 to 12 feet at 13 seconds.

* WHERE...Waters from Point Reyes to Pigeon Point 10-60 NM.

* WHEN...Until 9 PM PST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WARNING HAS EXPIRED
